7.title: Franka st.
7.description: The biggest parking facility in the city.

8.title: Shevtchenka st.
8.description: Parking facility in the central part of the city. Usually crowded.

9.title: G. Vashyngtona st.
9.description: Parking facility in the suburbs of the city, the biggest in the oblast.

12.title: Pasichna st.
12.description: A big parking facility in the suburbs of the city. Not as big as the one at Vashyngtona st, but comparably huge.
